name: Social Services
description: Mission Housing residents access the best social service programs available, provided by leading nonprofit organizations such as OnLok Lifeways and Centro Latino de San Francisco for senior programs, Mission Neighborhood Health Center for health services, and Mission Hiring Hall for employment placement and training programs. The Mexican Museum and the YMCA also partner with Mission Housing Development Corp.
fullDescription: Mission Housing residents access the best social service programs available, provided by leading nonprofit organizations such as OnLok Lifeways and Centro Latino de San Francisco for senior programs, Mission Neighborhood Health Center for health services, and Mission Hiring Hall for employment placement and training programs. The Mexican Museum and the YMCA also partner with Mission Housing Development Corp.
whatTheyOffer: Mission Housing residents access the best social service programs available, provided by leading nonprofit organizations such as OnLok Lifeways and Centro Latino de San Francisco for senior programs, Mission Neighborhood Health Center for health services, and Mission Hiring Hall for employment placement and training programs. The Mexican Museum and the YMCA also partner with Mission Housing Development Corp.
howToGetIt: Only available to Mission Housing residents. If you are a resident please reach out to the management for more information on how to access these services.
